== Rajavanthi (610655) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Rajavanthi is a village in the [[Pavagada ]] taluka of [[Tumkur]] district with an area of 947.22 hectares and harbouring 332 households with total population of 1482 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Pavagada]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 742 and female population is 740. Scheduled Caste Population is 196 and Scheduled Tribes population is 217. Census Location Code of the village is 610655<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
